# Simple descriptive table

## tbl_summary()

```{r}
library(gtsummary)

sm_trial <- 
  trial %>% 
  select(trt, age, grade, response)

sm_trial %>% 
  select(-trt) %>% 
  tbl_summary()
```

```{r}
trial2 <- trial %>% select(trt, age, grade)
trial2 %>% tbl_summary()
```


## include statistical tests

```{r}
trial2 %>% tbl_summary(by = trt) %>% add_p()

iris %>% tbl_summary(by = Species) %>% add_p()
```

## Add function to tbl_summary

- add_*()
- modify_*()
- bold_* () / italicize_* ()

```{r}
library(ISLR)

Wage %>% 
  select(wage,education, jobclass, health) %>% 
  tbl_summary(by = jobclass) %>% 
  add_p() %>% 
  add_q(method = "BH")
```
```{r}
mtcars %>% 
  select(am, mpg, cyl) %>% 
  tbl_summary(by = am) %>% 
  add_difference()
```

```{r}
mtcars %>% 
  select(am, mpg, cyl) %>% 
  tbl_summary(by = am) %>% 
  add_p() %>% 
  add_overall() %>% 
  add_n() %>% 
  add_stat_label()
```

## inline_text()

## tbl_merge() & tbl_stack()

## themes()

```{r}
theme_gtsummary_compact()

library(ISLR)    # for Auto dataset
m <- lm(mpg ~ origin * horsepower, data = Auto)
tbl_regression(m) %>% 
  modify_caption("Compact theme")
```
